name: VTKPlot
short_description:
Simple, interactive plotting of 2D/3D numpy arrays using python-vtk written in pure python using pylab-syle colormaps. Intended to have minimal overhead and maximum speed. There is a pylab-style and an oo interface.

Based on Kitware page examples.
